};

book;
</js>

<js>
var id=result.match(/article_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
var cid=result.match(/chapter_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
var hash=result.match(/hash = "([\d\w]+)"/)[1];
option = JSON.stringify({"method":"POST","body":"id="+id+"&eKey="+hash+"&cid="+cid+"&basecid="+cid})
JSON.parse(java.ajax(baseUrl.match(/(.+?\/\/[^\/]+\/)/)[1]+'/home/index/ajaxchapter,'+option)).info.content
</js>

<js>

var data = java.ajax(url);
data = JSON.parse(data);
data.bitrate.file_link;
</js>
